body:
fixes #24928 

Clingo install Python extensions in non-standard locations and after #24095 this causes issues on some platforms. This PR:
- [x] Add a default `site_packages_dir` property at the package level for each `PythonPackage`
- [x] Override that property for `clingo-bootstrap`
- [x] Add a new workflow to test bootstrapping on different operating systems
title: Test bootstrapping in a workflow
